channel.title: Silab client glitch help
channel.description:
hey i hav a question
can silabsoft look over the 3rd age plate and the anercal or whatever chest, because server side i put the code in plate body so it shows the arms,
but it made the arms go liek off the players body =\ can some1 help fix this

item.title: Silab client glitch help
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

as well as platebody you need to put it in body as well. plate body only defines how the UNDER body istaken off, such as sleeves and such. static int body,places it on the body.

Read full topic

item.title: Silab client glitch help
item.dc:creator: @zonus_warrior zonus warrior
item.description:
@zonus_warrior wrote:

you obviously put them in the wrong statistic slot...

obviously you dont know what your talking about either

[quote=“Zameix”]Thanks for version 3. The port changer is essential.

[size=15pt]Btw guys, the third age is getting exchanged for:

runecraft cape
hunter cape
wc cape
fletching cape
Smithing cape

And the Armadyl set is staying on there as it is fixable.[/size][/quote]

there getting removed because there buged l2read

Read full topic

item.title: Silab client glitch help
item.dc:creator: @Steph2 Steph.
item.description:
@Steph2 wrote:

you obviously put them in the wrong statistic slot…

Read full topic

item.title: Silab client glitch help
item.dc:creator: @zonus_warrior zonus warrior
item.description:
@zonus_warrior wrote:

No she doesn't. It's a server-side glitch, your server doesn't know where to put those items, because they're nulls. With this cache, it doesn't know where to put the items, so it just randomly chooses wear to equip it. I believe Itachi knows what he/she is saying.

obliviously you dont know what your talking about

Read full topic

even in zachera(or whatever it was).no-ip.org its messed up, theres no way to fix it yet…

With this cache, it doesn’t know where to put the items, so it just randomly chooses wear to equip it. I believe Itachi knows what he/she is saying.[/quote] Its Still messed up when you do that…

@Fr33b1e wrote:

No she doesn’t. It’s a server-side glitch, your server doesn’t know where to put those items, because they’re nulls. With this cache, it doesn’t know where to put the items, so it just randomly chooses wear to equip it. I believe Itachi knows what he/she is saying.
